oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Clay portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Henry Clay (1777-1852). Framed, oval painted portrait. He wears a dark coat and necktie with a white collar. The corners of the frame have embellishments.
U.S. Congressman from Kentucky, 1811-1821; 1823-1825. U. S. Senator from Kentucky, 1806-1807; 1810-1811; 1831-1842; 1849-1852. Secretary of State, 1825-1829.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clay, Henry, 1777-1852
Clay, Henry, 1777-1852;Cabinet officers--United States;Legislators--United States
Legislators
